creator: BAKU PAY, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Now, everything related to your finances is at the distance of your smartphone.
You no longer need to carry cash or cards. We offer our hand-picked features to solve your problems. Make instant payments, control your budget, use quick money transfers, get cashback and enjoy well-designed interface of Payonix.
Register, add all your payment cards and start managing your money.

Manage your payments
- Use contactless QR-code method to pay for groceries, utilities or anything else
- Collect all your payment cards in a single app
- Set the order of payment cards
- Send and receive money from your friends

Monitor your spending
- Track your finances and get valuable data for decision making
- See real time statistics of your transactions
Enjoy benefits of being Payonix user
- Receive cashbacks and pay with them
- Get special discounts and offers on favorite products and services
- Get in-app communication and 7/24 customer support
For more detailes, please visit https://www.payonix.com budget, use quick money transfers, get
cashback and enjoy well-designed interface of Payonix.

- Get special discounts and offers on favorite products and services
- Get in-app communication and 7/24 customer support

For more detailes, please visit https://www.payonix.com
descriptionShort: Payonix is an easy, fast and secure way to make payments via mobile devices.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Meet the long-awaited update. Now with "Payonix" you can make the following payments:


- Utilities

- Internet

- Stationary communication

- Cable TV

- Entertainment

- Government services

- Education

- Insurance
